code: export var checkResponse=function checkResponse(res){if(res.ok){return res.json();}return Promise.reject("Error: ".concat(res.status));};var lastWeeksDate=new Date();var currentDate=new Date();export var getLastWeek=function getLastWeek(){lastWeeksDate.setDate(lastWeeksDate.getDate()-7);return lastWeeksDate.toLocaleString();};export var getCurrentDate=function getCurrentDate(){return currentDate.toLocaleString();};
